Text: Ahoy landlubber! What brings ye to my humble abode?
Just investigating cult activity on this island. Would you happen to know anything about that?
Not at all, matey! The only thing that catches me eye is the vast ocean that stands before ye here!
Not to this ol' seadog it ain't, son!
I've dedicated me life to unearthing this 'ere ocean! It's as though she calls to me, ye see!
Day an' night I stand on me plank and watch her flow back and forth! It be a proper kinship we have, I tell ye!
